name: Soul Grid
description:
Soul Grid Is A Game Were You Control Grid Cells With Your Soul!
How To Play:
1. Use arrow keys to move
2. Collide with grid cells to connect with them, but you cant connect with red grid cells.
3. Drag pets, keys, and swords into your grid cells
4. Drop keys on chests to open them
5. Buy food from the shop and give the food to your pets so they don't die
